about_the_game:
Set of The Legend of Heroes: Kai no Kiseki -Farewell, O Zemuria- DLC items, including costumes and attachment items.

- Waiter & Bunny Costume Set Vol.1
- Waiter & Bunny Costume Set Vol.2
- Waiter & Bunny Costume Set Vol.3
- 4spg UNITED Costume Set
- Alternate Color Costume Set Vol.1
- Alternate Color Costume Set Vol.2
- Alternate Color Costume Set Vol.3
- Xipha Cover Set
- Attachment Item Set
- Falcom Music Collection A side
- Falcom Music Collection B side

*Premier Pass does not include consumable items.
*Each item included in the Premier Pass will also be available for individual purchase. Beware of duplicate purchases.
